verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>. O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Who can utter <WH4448> <WH8762> the mighty acts <WH1369> of the YY <WH3068>? who can shew forth <WH8085> <WH8686> all his praise <WH8416> ?
Blessed <WH835> are they that keep <WH8104> <WH8802> judgment <WH4941>, and he that doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> righteousness <WH6666> at all times <WH6256>.
Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> me, O YY <WH3068>, with the favour <WH7522> that thou bearest unto thy people <WH5971>: O visit <WH6485> <WH8798> me with thy salvation <WH3444>;

That I may see <WH7200> <WH8800> the good <WH2896> of thy chosen <WH972>, that I may rejoice <WH8055> <WH8800> in the gladness <WH8057> of thy nation <WH1471>, that I may glory <WH1984> <WH8692> with thine inheritance <WH5159>.
We have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> with our fathers <WH1>, we have committed iniquity <WH5753> <WH8689>, we have done wickedly <WH7561> <WH8689>.

Our fathers <WH1> understood <WH7919> <WH8689> not thy wonders <WH6381> <WH8737> in Egypt <WH4714>; they remembered <WH2142> <WH8804> not the multitude <WH7230> of thy mercies <WH2617>; but provoked <WH4784> <WH8686> him at the sea <WH3220>, even at the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>.
Nevertheless he saved <WH3467> <WH8686> them for his name's <WH8034> sake, that he might make his mighty power <WH1369> to be known <WH3045> <WH8687>.

He rebuked <WH1605> <WH8799> the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220> also, and it was dried up <WH2717> <WH8799>: so he led <WH3212> <WH8686> them through the depths <WH8415>, as through the wilderness <WH4057>.
And he saved <WH3467> <WH8686> them from the hand <WH3027> of him that hated <WH8130> <WH8802> them, and redeemed <WH1350> <WH8799> them from the hand <WH3027> of the enemy <WH341> <WH8802>.
And the waters <WH4325> covered <WH3680> <WH8762> their enemies <WH6862>: there was not one <WH259> of them left <WH3498> <WH8738>.
Then believed <WH539> <WH8686> they his words <WH1697>; they sang <WH7891> <WH8799> his praise <WH8416>.
They soon <WH4116> <WH8765> forgat <WH7911> <WH8804> his works <WH4639>; they waited <WH2442> <WH8765> not for his counsel <WH6098>:
But lusted <WH183> <WH8691> exceedingly <WH8378> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and tempted <WH5254> <WH8762> 'Elohim <WH410> in the desert <WH3452>.
And he gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them their request <WH7596>; but sent <WH7971> <WH8762> leanness <WH7332> into their soul <WH5315>.
They envied <WH7065> <WH8762> Mosheh <WH4872> also in the camp <WH4264>, and Aharon <WH175> the saint <WH6918> of the YY <WH3068>.
The earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> <WH8799> and swallowed up <WH1104> <WH8799> Dathan <WH1885>, and covered <WH3680> <WH8762> the company <WH5712> of Abiram <WH48>.
And a fire <WH784> was kindled <WH1197> <WH8799> in their company <WH5712>; the flame <WH3852> burned up <WH3857> <WH8762> the wicked <WH7563>.
They made <WH6213> <WH8799> a calf <WH5695> in Horev <WH2722>, and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691> the molten image <WH4541>.
Thus they changed <WH4171> <WH8686> their glory <WH3519> into the similitude <WH8403> of an ox <WH7794> that eateth <WH398> <WH8802> grass <WH6212>.
They forgat <WH7911> <WH8804> 'Elohim <WH410> their saviour <WH3467> <WH8688>, which had done <WH6213> <WH8802> great things <WH1419> in Egypt <WH4714>;
Wondrous works <WH6381> <WH8737> in the land <WH776> of Ham <WH2526>, and terrible things <WH3372> <WH8737> by the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>.

Therefore he said <WH559> <WH8799> that he would destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> them, had not <WH3884> Mosheh <WH4872> his chosen <WH972> stood <WH5975> <WH8804> before <WH6440> him in the breach <WH6556>, to turn away <WH7725> <WH8687> his wrath <WH2534>, lest he should destroy <WH7843> <WH8687> them.
Yea, they despised <WH3988> <WH8799> the pleasant <WH2532> land <WH776>, they believed <WH539> <WH8689> not his word <WH1697>:
But murmured <WH7279> <WH8735> in their tents <WH168>, and hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> not unto the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068>.
Therefore he lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027> against them, to overthrow <WH5307> <WH8687> them in the wilderness <WH4057>:
To overthrow <WH5307> <WH8687> their seed <WH2233> also among the nations <WH1471>, and to scatter <WH2219> <WH8763> them in the lands <WH776>.
They joined <WH6775> <WH8735> themselves also unto Baalpeor <WH1187>, and ate <WH398> <WH8799> the sacrifices <WH2077> of the dead <WH4191> <WH8801>.
Thus they provoked him to anger <WH3707> <WH8686> with their inventions <WH4611>: and the plague <WH4046> brake in <WH6555> <WH8799> upon them.
Then stood up <WH5975> <WH8799> Pinchas <WH6372>, and executed judgment <WH6419> <WH8762>: and so the plague <WH4046> was stayed <WH6113> <WH8735>.
And that was counted <WH2803> <WH8735> unto him for righteousness <WH6666> unto all <WH1755> generations <WH1755> for <WH5704> evermore <WH5769>.
They angered <WH7107> <WH8686> him also at the waters <WH4325> of strife <WH4808> <WH8677> <WH4809>, so that it went ill <WH3415> <WH8799> with Mosheh <WH4872> for their sakes:
Because they provoked <WH4784> <WH8689> his spirit <WH7307>, so that he spake unadvisedly <WH981> <WH8762> with his lips <WH8193>.
They did not destroy <WH8045> <WH8689> the nations <WH5971>, concerning whom the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH559> <WH8804> them:
But were mingled <WH6148> <WH8691> among the heathen <WH1471>, and learned <WH3925> <WH8799> their works <WH4639>.
And they served <WH5647> <WH8799> their idols <WH6091>: which were a snare <WH4170> unto them.
Yea, they sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8799> their sons <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> unto devils <WH7700>,

And shed <WH8210> <WH8799> innocent <WH5355> blood <WH1818>, even the blood <WH1818> of their sons <WH1121> and of their daughters <WH1323>, whom they sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8765> unto the idols <WH6091> of Kanahan <WH3667>: and the land <WH776> was polluted <WH2610> <WH8799> with blood <WH1818>.
Thus were they defiled <WH2930> <WH8799> with their own works <WH4639>, and went a whoring <WH2181> <WH8799> with their own inventions <WH4611>.
Therefore was the wrath <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> kindled <WH2734> <WH8799> against his people <WH5971>, insomuch that he abhorred <WH8581> <WH8762> his own inheritance <WH5159>.
And he gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them into the hand <WH3027> of the heathen <WH1471>; and they that hated <WH8130> <WH8802> them ruled <WH4910> <WH8799> over them.
Their enemies <WH341> <WH8802> also oppressed <WH3905> <WH8799> them, and they were brought into subjection <WH3665> <WH8735> under their hand <WH3027>.

Many <WH7227> times <WH6471> did he deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> them; but they provoked <WH4784> <WH8686> him with their counsel <WH6098>, and were brought low <WH4355> <WH8799> for their iniquity <WH5771>.
Nevertheless he regarded <WH7200> <WH8799> their affliction <WH6862>, when he heard <WH8085> <WH8800> their cry <WH7440>:
And he remembered <WH2142> <WH8799> for them his covenant <WH1285>, and repented <WH5162> <WH8735> according to the multitude <WH7230> of his mercies <WH2617>.
He made <WH5414> <WH8799> them also to be pitied <WH7356> of <WH6440> all those that carried them captives <WH7617> <WH8802>.

Save <WH3467> <WH8685> us, O YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, and gather <WH6908> <WH8761> us from among the heathen <WH1471>, to give thanks <WH3034> <WH8687> unto thy holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>, and to triumph <WH7623> <WH8692> in thy praise <WH8416>.

Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> from everlasting <WH5769> to everlasting <WH5769>: and let all the people <WH5971> say <WH559> <WH8804>, Amen <WH543>. Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> ye the YY <WH3050>.
